name: Just Roll With It! (CornflowerBlue)
description:
"Just Roll With It!" is a fast-paced platformer where you steer a constantly moving character named Lina, rolling around in inline skates where you pick up speed every 10 seconds! Start from methodically trotting around hazards and end blazing past them at light speed!

"Ready to roll!"

Check our socials out here!

Graphics/ Programming -  @Cornf_Blue

Music  - @CFY98

The Standalone version is the definitive version due to performance issues, but the Web Version should be fine as well.
